features.title: Your App Is Being Built...
features.subtitle: Watch your app come to life in real-time
features.overview:
Watch your app come to life! It's like having a super-smart assistant who takes your ideas and turns them into a real, working app right before your eyes. You'll see everything happening step by step - it's pretty amazing!

See It All Happen Live

You can watch every step as your app gets built. We'll show you exactly what's happening so you're never left wondering.

benefits.title: Watch It All Happen
benefits.description: You'll see exactly what's being built as it happens - no mystery, just progress!

benefits.title: Nothing Hidden
benefits.description: We explain everything in simple terms so you know what's going on

benefits.title: It Just Works
benefits.description: We test everything as we build it, so your app will work great from day one

benefits.title: Know When It's Done
benefits.description: We'll tell you how long it'll take so you can plan accordingly

howItWorks.title: We Listen to Your Ideas
howItWorks.description: Tell us what you want, and we'll figure out the best way to build it

howItWorks.title: We Build Each Piece
howItWorks.description: Like building with blocks, we create each part of your app one by one

howItWorks.title: We Put It All Together
howItWorks.description: All the pieces get connected and tested to make sure everything works perfectly

howItWorks.title: We Make It Perfect
howItWorks.description: We add the finishing touches to make your app fast and beautiful

useCases.title: Project Management
useCases.description: Monitor development progress and communicate with stakeholders

useCases.title: Quality Control
useCases.description: Ensure all requirements are met during the building process

useCases.title: Time Management
useCases.description: Plan your launch timeline with accurate progress estimates

features.gettingStarted: Just tell us what kind of app you want, and we'll build it for you! Most apps are ready in 5-15 minutes.

features.title: Your App's First Version Is Ready üéâ
features.subtitle: Celebrate your app's completion and explore its features
features.overview:
Woohoo! Your app is done and ready to go! Everything you asked for is built and working. Time to celebrate - you now have a real app that people can use!

What You Get

Your app works on phones, tablets, and computers. It has user accounts, stores data safely, and does everything you wanted. It's ready for people to try!

benefits.title: Fully Functional App
benefits.description: Complete application with all requested features working perfectly

benefits.title: Responsive Design
benefits.description: Works beautifully on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

benefits.title: Database Integration
benefits.description: Backend database configured and connected automatically

benefits.title: Security Features
benefits.description: Built-in security measures and user authentication systems

howItWorks.title: Final Testing
howItWorks.description: Automated tests ensure all features work correctly

howItWorks.title: Deployment Preparation
howItWorks.description: App is packaged and prepared for deployment

howItWorks.title: Quality Verification
howItWorks.description: Final quality checks and performance optimization

howItWorks.title: Ready for Launch
howItWorks.description: Your app is now ready for user testing and feedback

useCases.title: MVP Launch
useCases.description: Perfect for launching your minimum viable product

useCases.title: User Testing
useCases.description: Get feedback from real users with a working prototype

useCases.title: Market Validation
useCases.description: Test your business idea with a functional application

features.gettingStarted: Your app is ready! Click the preview button to see it in action and start showing it to friends and potential users.

features.title: Edit, Modify, or Add New Features
features.subtitle: Continuously improve your app with easy modifications
features.overview:
Want to change something? No problem! Just tell us what you'd like different, and we'll update your app. Add new features, change colors, or completely redesign parts - it's all super easy.

Keep Making It Better

Your app can grow and change as you learn what works best. Users giving feedback? Great - we can add those improvements!

benefits.title: No Code Required
benefits.description: Make changes using simple natural language descriptions

benefits.title: Instant Updates
benefits.description: Changes are applied and deployed immediately

benefits.title: Version Control
benefits.description: All changes are tracked and can be reverted if needed

benefits.title: User Feedback Integration
benefits.description: Easily implement suggestions from user testing

howItWorks.title: Describe Changes
howItWorks.description: Simply tell us what you want to modify or add

howItWorks.title: AI Processing
howItWorks.description: Our AI understands your request and plans the implementation

howItWorks.title: Live Implementation
howItWorks.description: Changes are made to your app in real-time

howItWorks.title: Testing & Deployment
howItWorks.description: Updates are tested and automatically deployed

useCases.title: Feature Updates
useCases.description: Add new functionality based on user needs

useCases.title: Design Changes
useCases.description: Update colors, layouts, and visual elements

useCases.title: Mobile Optimization
useCases.description: Improve mobile experience and responsiveness

features.gettingStarted: Just click 'Edit App' and tell us what you want to change. We'll take care of making it happen!

features.title: Troubleshooting Errors
features.subtitle: AI-powered debugging and error resolution
features.overview:
Don't worry about tech problems! Our system watches your app 24/7 and fixes most issues automatically. If something bigger comes up, we'll walk you through fixing it step by step.

We've Got Your Back

Most problems get fixed before you even know they happened. When we need your help, we'll explain everything clearly.

benefits.title: Automatic Detection
benefits.description: Issues are identified and often fixed automatically

benefits.title: Clear Explanations
benefits.description: Understand what went wrong and why in simple terms

benefits.title: Step-by-Step Fixes
benefits.description: Guided resolution process for complex problems

benefits.title: Prevention Tips
benefits.description: Learn how to avoid similar issues in the future

howItWorks.title: Error Detection
howItWorks.description: Continuous monitoring identifies issues as they occur

howItWorks.title: Root Cause Analysis
howItWorks.description: AI determines the underlying cause of the problem

howItWorks.title: Solution Generation
howItWorks.description: Multiple solution options are generated and tested

howItWorks.title: Implementation
howItWorks.description: Fixes are applied automatically or with your approval

useCases.title: Bug Detection
useCases.description: Identify and fix bugs before users encounter them

useCases.title: Performance Issues
useCases.description: Resolve slow loading times and optimization problems

useCases.title: Security Concerns
useCases.description: Address security vulnerabilities automatically

features.gettingStarted: We handle most problems automatically. If you need to check on anything, just look at your app's health dashboard.

features.title: App Versions
features.subtitle: Manage different versions of your application
features.overview:
Think of this like saving different drafts of a document. Every time you make big changes, we save a copy of your app so you can always go back if needed. It's like having an undo button for your entire app!

Super Simple Versions

No confusing tech stuff - just click to save a version or go back to an older one. Easy as that!

benefits.title: Safe Experimentation
benefits.description: Try new features without risk of breaking your live app

benefits.title: Easy Rollbacks
benefits.description: Instantly revert to any previous version if needed

benefits.title: Release Channels
benefits.description: Manage development, staging, and production versions

benefits.title: Change Tracking
benefits.description: See exactly what changed between versions

howItWorks.title: Automatic Snapshots
howItWorks.description: Every significant change creates a new version automatically

howItWorks.title: Manual Versioning
howItWorks.description: Create custom versions at important milestones

howItWorks.title: Comparison Tools
howItWorks.description: Compare features and changes between versions

howItWorks.title: Deployment Control
howItWorks.description: Choose which version goes live to your users

useCases.title: A/B Testing
useCases.description: Test different versions with different user groups

useCases.title: Staged Releases
useCases.description: Gradually roll out new features to users

useCases.title: Emergency Rollback
useCases.description: Quickly revert if critical issues are discovered

features.gettingStarted: We automatically save versions when you make big changes. Check the versions section to see all your app's history!

features.title: Mobile vs Desktop Preview
features.subtitle: See how your app looks on all devices
features.overview:
Want to see how your app looks on different devices? Easy! We can show you exactly how it appears on phones, tablets, and computers so you know it looks great everywhere.

Try It On Everything

Make sure your app works great no matter what device people use to access it.

benefits.title: Responsive Design Testing
benefits.description: Verify your app works perfectly on all screen sizes

benefits.title: Real Device Simulation

benefits.title: Touch vs Click Testing

benefits.title: Performance Insights
benefits.description: See how your app performs on different devices

howItWorks.title: Device Selection
howItWorks.description: Choose from popular phones, tablets, and desktop sizes

howItWorks.title: Interactive Preview
howItWorks.description: Fully interactive preview with real functionality

howItWorks.title: Performance Monitoring
howItWorks.description: Track loading times and responsiveness

howItWorks.title: Issue Detection
howItWorks.description: Automatically identify layout or functionality problems

useCases.title: Desktop Testing

features.title: Manage App Settings
features.subtitle: Configure your app's behavior and appearance
features.overview:
Make your app truly yours! Change colors, fonts, features, and how everything works. Think of it as your app's control center where you can adjust anything you want.

Your App, Your Way

Change anything from how it looks to what it does - it's all up to you!

benefits.title: Feature Configuration

features.title: Onboarding and Emails
features.subtitle: Set up user flows and email notifications
features.overview:
Help new users get started and keep existing ones coming back! Set up welcome messages and helpful emails that send automatically. It's like having a friendly assistant that greets everyone who uses your app.

Keep Users Happy

Good welcome experiences and helpful emails make people want to keep using your app!

benefits.title: Guided User Experience
benefits.description: Help new users discover and understand your app's value

benefits.title: Automated Workflows
benefits.description: Set up email sequences that run automatically

benefits.title: Personalization

features.title: Billing and Revenue
features.subtitle: Monetize your app with built-in payment systems
features.overview:
Ready to make money from your app? We make it super easy! Accept credit cards, PayPal, subscriptions - whatever you need. People can pay you directly through your app, and we handle all the tricky stuff.

Everything You Need to Get Paid

From simple one-time purchases to monthly subscriptions, we've got all the payment stuff covered!

benefits.title: Multiple Payment Methods
benefits.description: Accept credit cards, PayPal, bank transfers, and digital wallets

benefits.title: Subscription Management
benefits.description: Handle recurring billing, trials, and plan changes automatically

benefits.title: Global Support
benefits.description: Accept payments in multiple currencies worldwide

benefits.title: Revenue Analytics
benefits.description: Track revenue, customer lifetime value, and growth metrics

howItWorks.title: Payment Setup
howItWorks.description: Configure payment processors and methods

howItWorks.title: Pricing Plans
howItWorks.description: Create subscription tiers and pricing options

howItWorks.title: Checkout Integration
howItWorks.description: Seamless payment flows integrated into your app

howItWorks.title: Revenue Tracking
howItWorks.description: Monitor payments, refunds, and revenue growth

useCases.description: Monthly or yearly subscription plans

useCases.title: E-commerce
useCases.description: One-time purchases for products or services

useCases.title: Course Sales
useCases.description: Sell digital courses and educational content

features.gettingStarted: Our setup wizard walks you through everything step by step. You'll be accepting payments in just a few minutes!

features.title: Code Section
features.subtitle: Access and customize the generated code
features.overview:
Curious about how your app actually works? If you know how to code (or want to learn), you can see and even change the actual code that makes your app run. It's like looking under the hood of a car!

See How It All Works

You don't need to know coding to use Apper, but if you do, you have complete access to everything!

benefits.title: Complete Transparency
benefits.description: See exactly how your app is built with full source code access

benefits.title: Custom Modifications
benefits.description: Make advanced customizations beyond the visual editor

benefits.title: Learning Opportunity
benefits.description: Study the generated code to learn modern development practices

benefits.title: Export Freedom
benefits.description: Download your code and deploy anywhere you choose

howItWorks.title: Code Generation
howItWorks.description: Clean, well-commented code is generated automatically

howItWorks.title: Code Browser
howItWorks.description: Explore your app's codebase with our built-in browser

howItWorks.title: Edit & Test
howItWorks.description: Make changes and test them in a safe environment

howItWorks.title: Sync Changes
howItWorks.description: Merge your code changes back into the main app

useCases.title: Advanced Customization
useCases.description: Implement features not available in the visual editor

useCases.title: Learning Tool
useCases.description: Study well-structured code to improve your skills

useCases.title: Custom Deployment

features.gettingStarted: Click on 'Code' in your dashboard to see how your app is built. Perfect for learning or making advanced changes!

features.title: Database Setup
features.subtitle: Automatic database configuration and management
features.overview:
Think of your database as your app's memory - it's where all your information gets stored safely. We set this up automatically based on what your app needs to remember. No technical stuff required from you!

Smart Storage Setup

We figure out the best way to organize and store your app's information so everything runs smoothly!

benefits.title: Automatic Optimization
benefits.description: Database structure is optimized for your specific use case

benefits.title: Scalable Architecture
benefits.description: Built to handle growth from day one to millions of users

benefits.title: Backup & Security
benefits.description: Automated backups and enterprise-grade security

benefits.title: Easy Management
benefits.description: Manage your data through simple, intuitive interfaces

howItWorks.title: Requirements Analysis
howItWorks.description: AI analyzes your app to determine optimal database structure

howItWorks.title: Schema Generation
howItWorks.description: Database tables and relationships are created automatically

howItWorks.title: Data Migration
howItWorks.description: Existing data is migrated safely during updates

howItWorks.title: Ongoing Optimization
howItWorks.description: Performance is monitored and optimized continuously

useCases.title: Data Analytics
useCases.description: Store and analyze user behavior and business metrics

useCases.title: User Management
useCases.description: Handle user accounts, profiles, and permissions

useCases.title: Content Storage
useCases.description: Store app content, media files, and user-generated content

features.gettingStarted: We set up your database automatically when we build your app. You can view and manage your data using our simple tools!
